website_summaries.verdict: This lower-priced chrome-plated Olympic bar features threaded ends and includes weight clips.
pros: A 330 pound rated bar with threaded ends and medium knurl markings
Measures 86 inches long, weighs 39.38 pounds, and fits standard 2-inch plates
cons: This bar is longer than most Olympic bars

customer_reviews.title: Yes get it !!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bar and easy to put together too.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: great value for your health
customer_reviews.text: Now this is NOT a Weider Pro barbell set. What it is, is a great deal on a sturdy barbell that is tough enough for your basic workout. Assembly is pretty easy. The weights feels a bit low quality, they fel like plastic filled with cement, BUT they do the job! Definitely beat using cinder blocks like in the movies. The bar is heavy duty and well made. I recommend this for simple, no frills barbell use.
customer_reviews.author: Gil Laroya

customer_reviews.title: Really Good
customer_reviews.text: Love it, just keeps loosening , I keep tightening up, other than that its cool
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Not Perfect But Very Useful
customer_reviews.text: I was needing some weights with gyms closed during pandemic. This was modestly priced and easy to use. Delivered fast. It’s true the collars need to be tightened often and come ajar with use, but for the money a great buy! If you need 25-50 lbs this is a great set.
customer_reviews.author: Ted I Jones

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Son is a high school linebacker - he is using it for off season conditioning. Just what he asked for.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Grigsby

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Looks great feels great nothing wrong at all on my part! The box came all smashed up but I dont blame the people who make this for that. It was the shipping company. All and all would recommend hands down for home gym
customer_reviews.author: Brandon G

customer_reviews.title: “Olympic” lol.  Price gouged junk
customer_reviews.text: This set is a $60 Childs starter curl bar. There’s nothing Olympic about it, it’s pure junk. The fact that it was $180 during the Covid emergency, demonstrates how much integrity the seller has. Stay away, it’s garbage. The bar does not attach securely in the center, the weights are plastic coated cement dust, and the screw on ends don’t lock, they unscrew as you were using it. Even if it was $60, I would stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Bermuda sun

customer_reviews.title: Great value, decent quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Great set, great price. The only drawback - the weight plates come lose after 2 sets and the securing screws have to be tightened again. I generally never buy non prime, but I'm glad I made the exception here. Package arrived on time, packed well.
customer_reviews.author: Suitmonkey

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The barbell delivered to me is defective inside of the bar where the second piece is suppose to slide into. The steel wasn’t weldes properly and as a result, there is not enough room to slide in all the way, so the hole for the screws do not align. The screw packaged was also completely rusted over. For $175, I expected much better quality. At the current time, this product is completely useless.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great service, and great price
customer_reviews.text: At first I was unsure that this product was what I was looking for, but I contacted the seller and they answered all of my questions. The product arrived way before the expected time, and the quality of it was evident. Like other reviews mention, the ends become a bit loose after the workout but overall I’m satisfied, the weights and the bar won’t disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Katya

customer_reviews.title: good value for the money, but not a sturdy set.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value for the money. It's perfect for my needs--- just light lifting. BUT the weights become loose on the bar (the piece that holds weights on comes unscrewed while lifting). It's super annoying. After each set I have to retighten the weights on the bar. But, this set is very affordable compared to higher end sets. Don't expect great quality! But if you're needing it for simple lifting and you don't mind the headache of retightening, then order it. :) I hope this review is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Corey R Scott

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and works well!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised to see the box when it arrives as it was small. Only once I opened it I realized the bar had to be put together. It is pretty sturdy so far and I am feeling the difference in my body, so I'm happy about it. The reason I took 1 star off is because the weights are covered with some stinky chemical product that is very unsettling when you try to work out and breathe deeply. If you get this, you will have to clean it good before use.
customer_reviews.author: Saba

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small space
customer_reviews.text: Definitely see what others were saying about having to tighten the ends periodically during use, but it’s not a big deal. I live in a smaller place than I used to and needed a set that could be easily tucked away and this is perfect. I will need to get additional plates at some point but this weight is versatile for many exercises.
customer_reviews.author: Domh D. Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners that are starting to weight train.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for beginners and petite person. I use the weights loosely or on the bar... they work like dumbbells... I love it... like I said it’s the perfect fit for someone petite.I also use it to deadlift as well I’m 5ft 126 pounds.. I absolutely love it and “my gym” is at home a small room and they are perfect space savers!
customer_reviews.author: Perla Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: delivered 8 day early than expected & great quality
customer_reviews.text: I am a personal trainer and I am recommend this set to all of my online clients right now. After looking ALL over the internet, this is the best quality at a great value and shipping time was quick and free. The weights are in great condition. I really like that they are coated in plastic and not iron actually. they fit on the barbell perfectly and the locking system works perfectly fine. my pro tip is to clean the weights with bleach and water solution to get the chemical smell. That terrible smell came right out when I used the bleach and water but at first when I used soap and water it did nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Looked like a good starter set for a young person
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for our Grandson! We return it as the bolts that hold the weighs in place would and stay tight and the weights keep falling off! Making it dangerous! Looked like a good starter set for a young person , but didn’t work out!
customer_reviews.author: Deb Wernli

customer_reviews.title: Postage payment!
customer_reviews.text: I did not like, when after 2 sets weights come loose, no problem, just return it and we’re over it, nope, you have to pay postage to send it back, no cool! You know how much is gonna costs me? Based on weight, so i rather keep it under the bed collecting dust instead of paying more for an item that doesn’t work, I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: jorge quezada

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price
customer_reviews.text: You cant beat this for the price. Especially during the pandemic right now finding a barbell set was a nightmare but luckily i came accross this! It was easy to assemble but you do need to buy heavy duty clips they are fairly cheap. I wouldnt add anymore weight then it came with, but im really satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Taralynn17

customer_reviews.title: Flawed Parts
customer_reviews.text: Pretty poor design. Plus, the screw that it came with was flat on each end and didn't have a fitting for the Allen wrench. I had to use pliers to turn it
customer_reviews.author: customer 7

customer_reviews.title: Set screws suck as well
customer_reviews.text: Bar doesn't fit together right. Had to machine it down. Weights don't stay tight. Set screws suck as well.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Helman

customer_reviews.title: Unable to assemble, poor manufacturing
customer_reviews.text: The ‘set screw’ I received didn’t have a spot for the Allen key, making it impossible to use this bar. I contact the seller and they promised to send a new piece, still have not received it. Poor quality control
customer_reviews.author: Nick L

customer_reviews.title: Alright for some
customer_reviews.text: Too light for me for deadlifts and I am a beginner/intermediate lifter, 5 foot 1 and 118 lbs. if you are looking to really grow muscle I would look for something heavier
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bar but not so great weights
customer_reviews.text: I guess you get what you pay for. I could not find reasonable priced weights and I was limited because home weights were in demand. Hence, I purchased this set and am not happy with the weights. I like the bar but the weights were dusty right out of the package. It's too light and bad plastic. I don't recommend the weights. Instead buy steel weights.
customer_reviews.author: Jay M

customer_reviews.title: Different in appearance
customer_reviews.text: The weights are not the glossy plastic you see in the photo. They are cheaper quality than that. All together a good product tho. Gets the job done
customer_reviews.author: PandabearManda

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: I’m glad I bought this while it was still in stock. I use it every other day. The only negative was that I got a metal splinter the first day, after I wiped it down it was fine. It hasn’t broken on me yet so that’s good. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Reading the comments before purchasing and people said the weights ...
customer_reviews.text: Reading the comments before purchasing and people said the weights stay on. Well every time I started lifting them the part which keeps the weights in place and tight kept coming loose it could have caused some serious damage or pain if they fell off. I sent it back
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Expected Quality For The Price.
customer_reviews.text: Good deal I suppose. However the bars always come apart. To be expected but just be careful, it could be dangerous. Overall I use dumbells more, but I don't regret buying this.
customer_reviews.author: manuel

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother with this
customer_reviews.text: Yikes this product arrived in a beat up box but that really doesn’t explain why the plates were greasy and used. We spent about an hour cleaning everything just to find out you have to keep tightening the plates on there when you are using them bc it keeps coming loose. They are lucky we can’t find any barbells right now during the pandemic we were forced to keep this item
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not secure
customer_reviews.text: The fasteners don’t work at all. They loosen up between reps and I often find myself re tightening them multiple times a workout. Very nerve racking the weights could injure me. Most likely sending back, as this is starting to get dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Narjis M.

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: When the package arrived it was missing and important piece to join the barbell. If you are used to working out at gym, will not recommend this product. The bar is difficult to use especially when you have to do clean and press. The rotation of the bar is not smooth at all.
customer_reviews.author: BEJAL WADHWANI

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Bar is strong and sturdy but the weights were plastic filled with a granular material. Not the best quality but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Nezbelthar

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and not well built
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy using it in my garage but i was kind if dissapointed with it’s quality, but hey you get what u pay for !!!
customer_reviews.author: Digital Solutions Expert

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I’m only giving it 4 stars bc the weights can fall off the bar rather easy, the things that are used to screw them on, loosens up by themselves
customer_reviews.author: anika87

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I was Leary for the price but for a total amateur like me this is perfect. It’s easy to use and change the bars.
customer_reviews.author: LADY B

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product that Gets the job done. This is perfect for a women that’s just beginning since the weights aren’t that heavy but I’m assuming more weights can be added for men. If so this item is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: HOWARDGANG

customer_reviews.title: So glad I found this in stock
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband and he is very happy with it. It's just what we needed for our home gym
customer_reviews.author: shocky

customer_reviews.title: Got used ones when ordering new ones
customer_reviews.text: The weights are ok for hobby usage. But I ordered new ones and clearly got used ones. They looked used and the package had been opened and then closed before. Disappointing, but. It worth the return.
customer_reviews.author: Chris K.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my teenage don who loved this set! Good quality for my money.
customer_reviews.author: Deirdre McCullough

customer_reviews.title: Clips really don't hold weights no matter how much you tighten them
customer_reviews.text: Before buying, I read some of the negative reviews regarding the clips not holding the weights on the bar. Thought that couldn't be the case every time so I took my chances... well I was wrong.. those things really don't hold. It's annoying having to tighten them after each set I do. Not cool.
customer_reviews.author: higgs1881

customer_reviews.title: Bar weight
customer_reviews.text: The equipment arrived as described and is easy to add weights to barbell. The bar does add additional weight, when you add your weights.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Forrest

customer_reviews.title: They do the job...
customer_reviews.text: They work fine - but the fasteners spin off with smallest of movement. You will have to keep tightening the weights on.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A.

customer_reviews.title: Very bad costumer service
customer_reviews.text: TERRIBLE !!!!! Came with a missing part, can’t even put it together!!! And I have to pay for return shipping. Calling already for a week everyday nobody take a call or call back
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Shop around before buying this.
customer_reviews.text: The pins that are made to keep the weights on dont work very well and they keep sliding off which makes the weights away a little. The weights are just send inside a plastic container. They arent actually metal or anything. Does a decent job I guess. I should have spent more money on a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Thomas Newsome

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: I had to wait a month for this product but it was well worth it!! I am so happy to have these weights during this quarantine. I can do sooo many variations.
customer_reviews.author: somer luna

customer_reviews.title: Great price and speedy delivery
customer_reviews.text: Great price and speedy delivery. I'm making a 800 sq foot home gym space so these will be a nice addition to work out with. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Harper

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought for husband for his birthday. He loves it! Always saying how nice it is and that he really enjoys it. Nice quality!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Mason

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Read reviews. Was on fence. Glad I bought Although I do Wish different kind of design to kick plates in place, I have Had no issues with weights falling off or becoming loose. Enjoying the add to home gym.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall great.
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before purchasing and like wise the weight securing screw keeps loosening after a while, but it’s easily adjustable. I’ll be honest, I know nothing about gym equipment, but it was really easy to put together and seems sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Serey

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: New to weight lifting and this is exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Ruksana

customer_reviews.title: Light workouts at home
customer_reviews.text: It’s good if you just need something to do at home and it doesn’t take up much space. It’s sturdy, but everything gets a little jiggly. The weights are plastic and can get dented. It’s a good buy just to stay active.
customer_reviews.author: Rom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Great price and arrived in 2 days (even ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Great price and arrived in 2 days (even before some of the other stuff I bought from Amazon arrived).
customer_reviews.author: K. Imran

customer_reviews.title: Good little set
customer_reviews.text: This came in a little over a week! Great for the cost, the clamps do come loose every set but those are cheap to replace.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The bar is flimsy. I had to buy a new one piece solid version.
customer_reviews.author: LilRob65

customer_reviews.title: Professional quality barbell set
customer_reviews.text: The product was very well packed for shipping to protect the set. I was happy with the ease and perfection provided to put the bar together. I am excited to use this set in my weight program at home.
customer_reviews.author: L Douglas Rosenoff

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Very Fast shipping, put it together the same day. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I wanted! Sturdy and was delivered quickly.
customer_reviews.author: meghan Ferrelli

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Middle connection is loose and both screws stripped with hardly and pressure.Other then that,its okay.
customer_reviews.author: Ryuko

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: Totally awesome, bar is heavy as it is along with its plates .. looks exactly like the picture, since gyms hours are limited great way to built up my strength again ..
customer_reviews.author: fasiha

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I purchased this weight set. It was delivered way earlier than the expected time. It was also super easy to assemble and all of the expected pieces were present. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Dana Blakeney

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: This was the last piece I needed to finish my basic home gym. I started using immediately after putting it together and the sturdiness is just as good as much more expensive sets. Now I can get a full workout everyday from the commodity of my home. No need to drive anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: On the loose
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard to keep the weights securely tightened on the bar
customer_reviews.author: Beth Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Great weight set.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son, he’s very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: David Balk

customer_reviews.title: Weights were the only ones available during Covid.
customer_reviews.text: The weights don’t stay tightened. I constantly have to adjust them
customer_reviews.author: Janine Gevas

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase
customer_reviews.text: Glue on on produxt. Scratched. LooKS used. When assembling the bar... Allen key gets stuck and can't remove. Poor quality. So I took it apart and going to just use the disc as cheap free weights for now.
customer_reviews.author: bex

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars
customer_reviews.text: The only reason this isn’t five stars is because I have to frequently tighten the “screw” to keep the weights intact. Other than that, it’s pretty much worth it. Easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could write a good review but my order came up missing
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: This set had worked out so well. Great for the value and just what we needed! Shipped quickly and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Wish I knew the plates were filled with sand.
customer_reviews.text: I got them and didnt know they where filled with sand. I used them once and when I did my first set I notice sand was on the the them away..its a reason they super cheap..dont buy..
customer_reviews.author: david mcwhite

customer_reviews.title: Good grip
customer_reviews.text: I like the handle. Gives it a good grip. Good one.
customer_reviews.author: AL8

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my home gym !!
customer_reviews.text: Got for my basement home gym. Great addition for the price
customer_reviews.author: Robin D.

customer_reviews.title: Missing part
customer_reviews.text: It did not come with the connector piece. Can’t put the bar together.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa LaSorte

customer_reviews.title: Great starter!
customer_reviews.text: Great starter set for a home gym! Check out my Instagram @wendyleeann17 to see all the ways I added to my home gym!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This product is being sent from China. Most likely dropshipped. Although the product is easy to assemble and great to use It is highly overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Zion Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Basic barbell set - no frills
customer_reviews.text: Basic substitute for upper arm workout when gyms are closed due to COVID-19. Easy setup. Ring locks tend to spin off with reps - bit annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Simbinator

customer_reviews.title: Cheap to buy but sometimes you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The Locking nut does not stay locked very well barely get through one workout without it loosening
customer_reviews.author: Kscott

customer_reviews.title: 1 star
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sure I received somebody’s returned weights....they were dented and dirty
customer_reviews.author: Savanna Pinkston

customer_reviews.title: Very good purchase👍🏼👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: Very good purchase! I give it a 5 stars ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️
customer_reviews.author: Guy Thierry Charles

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The parts don’t even fit into the slot so what’s the point?
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for price
customer_reviews.text: I like the bar.... One side of the clips always comes un done.... So you have to spin it.... But its fine
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Grimm

customer_reviews.title: Happy with product
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the shipping speed. Good quality bar and plates. Easy to assemble and comes with clips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Item shipped quickly and exactly as expected! Only issue is I can't find any spring collars to fit
customer_reviews.author: Tanya C

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very solid for vinyl weights. The bar is easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Hardie White

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy from them
customer_reviews.text: Did not get all the parts and they won’t answer my emails
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne F.

customer_reviews.title: Nice set.
customer_reviews.text: Nice set to start lifting or to get back into. Bar feels really solid, weights are fine.No issues with the spin locks loosening while in use. Only con was the pin to secure the bar together was just loose in the box. Very easily could have been overlooked or fallen out if the box took damage.
customer_reviews.author: Zero33

customer_reviews.title: ... how you can go wrong with a simple item like this. The item can be disassembled & stored ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't really see how you can go wrong with a simple item like this. The item can be disassembled & stored away. Also, the weights that come with it have a flat surface that keep your barbell in place. Been using this for almost two months and is very comfortable to lift. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look at a Local Fitness Shop
customer_reviews.text: This was ok except for three things: 1. The end screws are not tight. 2. Mines didn’t come with the screw to connect the bar. Wtf am I supposed to do? 3. The packaging was downright stupid. It was a half-torn cardboard box with a torn bag over it—all wrapped up one ziptie-material strap.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Hsu

customer_reviews.title: This is a great starter set, especially if you're trying CrossFit at home.
customer_reviews.text: It's great if you want to incorporate some CrossFit/CrossFit-like weight training into your at-home routine. I'm 5'3", 115 lbs., and this was a great set for me. I think it would work well for everyone, to start, unless you are used to much heavier weight.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle

product_meta.title: YAHEETECH 55lb Olympic Barbell Dumbbell Weight Set Gym Lifting Exercise Workout Olympic Bar Curl Bar
feature_bullets: Suitable for strength exercises to develop your body pumper,leg, hip & back power ;
This dumbbell weight set includes 4 x 2.5 Kg (5.5 lb Kg) plates,2 x 5 Kg (11 lb) plates, a 4in bar and 1 pair of star lock collars;
The barbell bar is made of high-quality iron and this set of dumbbells is also coated with anti-rust paint to prevent rust and ensure service life.
The Olympic bar is built with W shape for a comfortable and steady hold;Anti-skid thread design for hand holding part, sweating to prevent skidding;

The weightlifting barbell set is equipped with 2 star locks, which can fix the weightlifting plate in various places to ensure your stability and safety, so that you do not have to worry about the plate falling or slipping during the exercise.
